examples.chinese: 他只会遇到好事抢功劳,遇到坏事推卸责任
examples.translation: He only steals credit when things go well, and shifts blame when things go bad

examples.chinese: 你跟同事抢功劳,失了人心,关键时候没人搭把手
examples.translation: Stealing credit from colleagues loses hearts, no one helps when it matters

examples.chinese: 某些人干活的时候不见人,抢功劳的时候跑得比都快
examples.translation: Some people are invisible when working, but run faster than anyone to steal credit
